## getApp() function

Gets App from the DI container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getApp(): App;
```
**Returns:**

[App](./foundation-shell.app.md)

## Remarks

A utility method for host applications that are not using decorators or the DI container.

## Example


```ts
import { getApp } from '@genesislcap/foundation-shell/app';
...
private user = getApp();
```
